comments:
Build ID: M20070212-1330

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Try to load te NAB/MWT perspective
 - Error message: Problems opening perspective 'org.eclipse.nab.mwt.ab.MwtPerspective'
2. Try to create a NAB/MWT project
 - Error message: The selected wizard could not be started.
Reason:
Plug-in org.eclipse.nab.mwt was unable to load class org.eclipse.nab.mwt.ab.core.MwtNewProjectWizard.



More information:
The following errors occur when I load Eclipse or do the steps above.

java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
